description: From Ancient Greek νομαδικός (nomadikós), equivalent to nomad (“a member of a society or class of herdsmen”) + -ic (forming adjectives).

adjectives.description: nomadic (comparative more nomadic, superlative most nomadic)

entries.meaning: (anthropology) Of or related to itinerant herdsmen.
(figuratively) Of or related to any habitually wandering person or animal.
